wikipedia_page.main: Mark Lawrence is a British actor from Swindon. He went to Dorcan School in Dorcan, studied in New York at the Lee Strasberg Institute, and started his career in London on shows such as CrimeWatch and Family Affairs. His most notable role was in the 2001 miniseries Band of Brothers.

response: * Mark Lawrence as Corporal William Dukeman

:The Dorcan Academy (formerly Dorcan Comprehensive School) is also in this area, providing the locality with sports facilities. Notable as the school attended by Melinda Messenger, and actor Mark Lawrence (from the series Band of Brothers).
*Mark Lawrence (bishop) (born 1950), Bishop of the Diocese of South Carolina
*Mark Lawrence (musician), principal trombonist of the San Francisco Symphony Orchestra, 1974–2007
*Mark Lawrence (ice hockey) (born 1972), Canadian ice hockey player
*Mark Lawrence (rugby union) (born 1965), former rugby union player and current referee
